parameters: So many weird and wonderful contraptions here
aren't there? Anyway, ready to set sail
Great, head into the hold and i'll get us
Great, head into the hold and i'll get us
No problem, let me know when you want to
Oh, it's you. I assumed that you had been
killed in the attack on the castle.
I nearly was - they were so determined to get
into...wherever it was they were going, that
they didnt pay attention to the prisoners
while they were still fighting the guards.
Elim, how do you know this man?
He said that he was locked up for stealing
some food from the castle kitchens. I was...
sceptical, but I gave him some food anyway.
I see. Well i'm afraid he's fooled you, but
you wouldn't be the only one. He was caught
spying on the castle in the dead of night.
We weren't able to find out exactly what he
was up to, but I wasn't prepared to take any
Look, I was just doing my duty, I meant no
harm. The cogs of Durast all have their role
in the machine, and I was merely carrying out
mine. We just like to keep informed on things.
Given that we're on your turf now, it's not
like i'm about to try and take you back into
custody. What say we just call it even and
I fully intend to, but first I have a debt to
settle with you. You helped me when you didn't
need to, so allow me to extend you the same
To get out of the docks, the Clockwork Knights
will demand an "administration fee". In reality
its nothing more than a shakedown to squeeze
whetever gold they can out of visitors.
And just how much is this "fee"?
Relax, that's why i'm here. I don't have enough
gold to cover the full fee, but I can break
the back of it for you.
He hands you a very heavy coin purse. You can't be sure,
but given your experience there is at least several
I can't accept this, its far too much gold.
Elim, don't look the gift horse in the mouth...
Hah! Relax, I will come into more gold soon.
This is just all I was able to muster for now.
Yes, I suppose we are. Thank you.
One last tip for you - when you get into the
city of Garras proper, I recommend you seek
It's many things - it's a gambling hall,
it's an inn, but its also a hub for people
looking to hire mercenaries. If you're looking
for work to make some coin, you could do
I'll keep that advice in mind, thanks.
